flawed_nl_solution:
20% of her 40 students will bring their own life vest so 0.2*40 = <<0.2*40=8>>8 students will bring their life vests
Alice has 20 life vests and 8 students will bring there's so that's 20+8 = <<20+8=28>>28 life vests
There are 40 students and 10 instructors total so that's 40+10 = <<40+10=40>>40 people in the class
If there are 28 life vests and she has 40 people then she needs to find 40-28 = 12 more life vests
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
